timer?: Do you see an 'oxygen depleted' timer?

exitAlert.title: EXIT TO MAIN MENU
exitAlert.exitInstructions: Please exit to the main menu where you can see your ship in the hangar immediately!

infoAlert.enterGameWarning: Do not enter back into the game unless you are told so.
infoAlert.gatherInfo: DO NOT login to check, but write down how much time was left on the oxygen clock and where you were approximately in the system. This will be asked during the rescue.

platform.which?: In which mode are you playing?
